short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dive into an underwater world of chaos and charm with Jinx - Aquatic Adventure in a Live Theme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension captures Jinx in a stunning aquatic environment, blending her bold energy with serene ocean vibes. Instantly access favorite websites, add personalized shortcuts, and keep track of time with the integrated calendar and clock. The built-in search bar ensures seamless web browsing.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Explore Jinx’s underwater adventure in dynamic, vivid animation.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Access frequently visited websites in a click.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Personalize your browsing with your favorite links.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Stay organized with a handy date and time display.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Enjoy quick, efficient searches with your chosen engine.

Discover more character-inspired themes, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall with ease through the available options.
